Navigation Data.
Get the drone position from takeoff point (0, 0, 0, 0). The orthonormal basis is fixed at this point. The axis are oriented the following way : * X : From the rear of the drone to its front. * Y : From the right of the drone to its left. * Z : Orthogonal to X and Y and oriented upward. * Psi : From 180 to -180 in the clockwise direction,
